actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that future increases in social security benefits shall be disregarded in determining eligibility for benefits or assistance under the supplemental security income program, the program of aid to families with dependent children, the medicaid program, and certain other Federal programs.

summary.text: Provides that future increases in social security benefits shall be disregarded in determining eligibility for benefits or assistance under the supplemental security income program, the program of aid to families with dependent children, the medicaid program, and other specified Federal programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide that future increases in social security benefits shall be disregarded in determining eligibility for benefits or assistance under the supplemental security income program, the program of aid to families with dependent children, the medicaid program, and certain other Federal programs.
